name: Space Shooter: 2 Player
description:
If you like space shooting and survival games with great graphic and gameplay, you must enjoy this game.

This Space Shooter : 2 Players is retro space shooting game and well created for you who want throwback to your happy childhood.

This game can be played 2 players at same device to get more adventure with your friends or your children.

The game is packed with beautifull graphic and BGM.

There are 5 stage wait to completed.

I hope you enjoy this game, if any error or suggestion for other game, please let us know by emailing us.

Enjoy the game!
